scripts.dev: concurrently "npm start --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.install:apollo: cd apollo && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.postinstall: yarn install:apollo && yarn install:client && yarn install:server
scripts.prepush: concurrently "npm run prepush --prefix client" "npm run prepush --prefix server" "npm run prepush --prefix apollo"
scripts.onpull_request: concurrently "npm run onpull_request --prefix client" "npm run onpull_request --prefix server" "npm run onpull_request --prefix apollo"
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint --prefix client" "npm run lint --prefix server" "npm run lint --prefix apollo"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --prefix client" "npm run build --prefix server" "npm run build --prefix apollo"
